rooms.description: An open entrance area that leads to the main courtyard and connects to all rooms.
Spacious living room with Vastu-aligned seating arrangement. Adjacent to a window facing north for light.
Dining area positioned in the east direction as per Vastu guidelines, ensuring positive energy.
Functional kitchen with modern amenities while retaining traditional Kerala aesthetics. Placed in the south direction to avoid negativity.
Primary bedroom located towards the west for a quiet environment; large window for ventilation.
Bathroom adjacent to the primary bedroom, ensuring privacy and proper drainage as per local norms.
Secondary bedroom for guests, located on the south side of the ground floor with adequate natural light.
Quiet study or work area in a northeast corner to maximize positive energy flow.

openings.description: Large entrance door allowing for a welcoming feel, aligned with Vastu to invite positive energy.
Multiple windows strategically placed to ensure natural ventilation and lighting in accordance with local building norms.
Balcony that overlooks the main courtyard, providing an extra open space and adhering to Vastu by promoting fresh air circulation.

rooms.description: Open plan studio area combining living and dining spaces in a traditional Kerala layout, with central courtyard view.
Private gym integrated into the villa design for health and fitness purposes. Located on the first floor to ensure privacy and tranquility.

openings.description: A series of windows across the first floor to provide ample light and fresh air as per traditional design principles.
